extendedInfo.description: MoboPlayer Codec (FFMpeg) for ARM V7_VFPV3Just Plugin. You must install MoboPlayer First.Please DO NOT install this, if MoboPlayer works well. Thanks.

reviews.title: you suck really bad
reviews.comment: deserves - 10 stars, left me in a 16hours flight without working cause some morons at mobo decided it needed a mandatory update.... go figure, i was inside a fuckin plane! it was working just fine the day before! Update-now it doesn\'t even work after installing the codec pack, pathetic!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: most impressive!
reviews.comment: Talk about user-friendly! I\'ve had my Xoom only a day or two & couldn\'t figure out how to get my home movies transferred. They are AVI & WMV & it looked like I\'d have to convert all of them. That would have taken ages! Much faster & easier this way.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: boo!
reviews.comment: mandatory flawed update = failed product. please fix asap
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This app is sickly awesome!!!! my first review.
reviews.comment: Best app I ever downloaded for video playback. The app remembers where you were in the video, even after closing or if you play another video, download the correct codec, no guess work from me. It plays all format I throw it WOW! no more conversions!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice....
reviews.comment: Works flawless in my sony tablet s......
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cool so far
reviews.comment: I had the same problem cesar had. This clearly states the if your player is working do not install this codec BUT it forces you to install it. When it installs it didn\'t work, sends you to black screen. solution was to uninstall and reinstall a couple times then when I ended up at the black screen I hit the back button and there Moboplayer was in all its shining glory!!! soooooo 4 stars since it made me work for it ***update:  stopped  working after day but mobo player app was updated so works fine now
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Codec pouring V7
reviews.comment: Nice. Great developer
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome App!
reviews.comment: This app is great. I love the fact that it shows the file info (format, resolution, etc.). I just wish it played the .mov files that my DSLR camera puts out. Also, it would be nice if it would list just the folders you select, then let you pick which of those folders to view. I don\'t need to see every video from my selected folders when I just want to watch something from my movie folder. Other than those two things, this app is perfect. Acer Iconia Pad A500.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Had trouble opening some mp4 videos
reviews.comment: It was not able to open some videos recorded from my phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ActipnAl
reviews.comment: Love the way this player works with videos, but it doesn\'t play my mp3 formatted songs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: This app is great! The only one I found that can actually play mkv video subtitles! If there were some way to have it play unsupported audio formats then it would probably be the best video player on the market!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This codec improves performance a little on kyocera echo. But occasional squelching audio is still present...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked great before new Codec!
reviews.comment: I used this program a lot, and I had no problems with it.  Today it says that a new Codec must be installed.  OK, that\'s fine.  I did that, installed from the Play Store onto my XOOM and now when I open MoboPlayer all I get is the screen saying that I need to update the Codec.  The installation is not registering in the program I guess.  Now the program is useless.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Need network play as well. Excellent app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: You suc.. big time moro..s
reviews.comment: I don\'t know why I picked mobo over mx player. It simply does not play i was in train and it totally ruined my time. My default player works better  than this rubbish stuff.
reviews.author: Nishant Bagoria

reviews.title: Works like a charm...
reviews.comment: Love it on my Acer A500...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked for Asus Transformer
reviews.comment: When I installed MoboPlayer it said I needed a codec and it recommended this one. The \"ARMV7VFP3\" sounds like a processor type. Not sure what it refers to but it worked well. I can watch xvid and divx avi files perfectly.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Stop working after last update.
reviews.comment: I upgraded to jellybean and then updated moboplayer now moboplayer keeps telling me I have to install the plugin. When I do and restart mono it keeps telling me its not installed and prompts me to download again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Maka naka waka wth!  This app works well i lyk it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Latest Update Broke
reviews.comment: After the latest update, Mobo no longer works on my tablet running Jelly Bean :-(  I will revise my review/rating if and when this gets fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User
